name: atomic-protocol
description: Atomic Protocol is a modern, efficient, and fully TypeScript-rewritten version of PrismarineJS/bedrock-protocol. It's built with performance and maintainability in mind.
author: Serial-V

scripts.build: tsc --project tsconfig.json && shx mkdir -p dist/config && shx cp src/config/steve.json dist/config/
scripts.release: turbo run bundle --filter=. && yarn version --patch && git push && git push --tags && yarn publish --non-interactive
scripts.release:beta: turbo run bundle --filter=. && yarn version --snapshot beta && git push && yarn publish --no-git-tag --snapshot --tag beta
scripts.release:minor: turbo run bundle --filter=. && yarn version --minor && git push && git push --tags && yarn publish --non-interactive
